item.title: How a content designer collaborates with a product designer
item.description: There’s no right way to do it but maybe this will help. The benefits of content and product design collaboration are no secret. Many words have been shared on Medium and Substack about why collaboration is important but few speak to the mechanics. Maybe it’s because there’s no right way to do it. It’s hard to talk about something without being prescriptive because people generally want to be told how to do something.
